723700f-a.text:
99 to 81 Vandam Street, north side, west of, adjoining, and at Hudson Street. No. 97-93, the Thaddeus Davis Incorporated Comgany plant, is to be sold at Receiver's Auction by Joseph P. Day. No. 93-87 is a brand new annex of the Henry Heide candy factory across the street, to which it is connected by a bridge. It replaced four old four-story brick houses. The fifth house, No. 85, was also demolished, and the space used for a service
drive. No. 83 is an old nine-story warehouse.
1924.
723700f-a.folder: Vandam Street & Hudson Street, Manhattan, NY

723701f-a.text:
Vandam Street, between Hudson and Varick Streets.
1900
P. L. Sperr
